short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete browser history granularly. This extension allows you choose a duration and specify search terms. One-click button to delete

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete browser history in a very granular way with the click of a button. This extension allows you choose a duration and specify search terms.
